solution_line_template: The total cost of five boxes of pizza is ${box_cost} x {num_boxes} = ${total_pizza_cost}{total_pizza_cost}.
He gave ${total_pizza_cost} x {tip_fraction} = ${tip_amount}{tip_amount} tip to the delivery man.
He spent a total of ${total_pizza_cost} + ${tip_amount} = ${total_spent}{total_spent} for the pizza and the tip.
The change that he received is ${money_given} - ${total_spent} = ${change_received}{change_received}.
